info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Anderson and central Abbeville Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Anderson, or near Iva, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Due West, Iva, Lake Secession, Donalds, Lowndesville, Starr and Antreville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
